imdb.plot outline: Follow Ki's performances, studio work, zany humor and spirited lifestyle, from their humble beginnings to the transformation of their fans and their mission to build a better planet as they delight audiences with pure energy and a rainbow-colored soundscape of rock, pop, funk, blues, folk, alternative and electronic music where anything is possible.
imdb.title: When Stars Align
plot: Follow Ki's performances, studio work, zany humor and spirited lifestyle, from their humble beginnings to the transformation of their fans and their mission to build a better planet as they delight audiences with pure energy and a rainbow-colored soundscape of rock, pop, funk, blues, folk, alternative and electronic music where anything is possible.::Ki
